snippet: Big Data is the subject of a forthcoming glossy photo book, a smartphone application for personal data analysis and comparison, and an interactive version of the book for the iPad. The project is the brainchild of Rick Smolan, creator of the "Day in...
abstract: Big Data is the subject of a forthcoming glossy photo book, a smartphone application for personal data analysis and comparison, and an interactive version of the book for the iPad. The project is the brainchild of Rick Smolan, creator of the "Day in the Life" series of books.

headline.main: Big Data Gets Its Own Photo Album
headline.print_headline: Putting a Face On the World Of Big Data

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: The Human Face of Big Data (Book)
